attributes.action: Petition the Iranian government not to execute the 13 year old icest victim"girl" and treat her as a victim, not a sinner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is the most barbaric sentance i have ever heard of, her brother raped her, he was entanced to 150 lashes, her, the victim to death.
This must not stand!
Please make your objection to the relevant authorities i beg you!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
